input.sentences: i went to the aquarium yesterday .
there were many unique sea life there .
i had a great time there .
output.sentences: Yesterday we went to visit the aquarium.
We saw lots of really unique and interesting fish and sea life.
We took a lot of pictures so we could remember our day.
One of our favorite things was the penguins who were playing and swimming.
We had a great time exploring and learning during our visit to the aquarium.
